scripts.prepare:aurora-testnet: mustache configs/aurora-testnet.json templates/aurora.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:aurora: mustache configs/aurora.json templates/aurora.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.prepare:ethereum-testnet: mustache configs/rinkeby.json templates/ethereum.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npx graph codegen
scripts.deploy:aurora: npm run prepare:aurora && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora-staging: npm run prepare:aurora && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-aurora-staging --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:aurora-testnet: npm run prepare:aurora-testnet && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
scripts.deploy:ethereum-testnet: npm run prepare:ethereum-testnet && npx graph deploy endemic-nft/endemic-ethereum-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/
